verses.verse: ( I Have Stilled My Soul) שִׁ֥יר <WH7892> šîr A song הַֽמַּֽעֲל֗וֹת <WH4609> ham·ma·‘ă·lō·wṯ of ascents. לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> lə·ḏā·wiḏ Of David. יְהוָ֤ה׀ <WH3068> Yah·weh O LORD, לֹא־ <WH3808> lō- is not גָבַ֣הּ <WH1361> ḡā·ḇah proud, לִ֭בִּי <WH3820> lib·bî My heart וְלֹא־ <WH3808> wə·lō- are not רָמ֣וּ <WH7311> rā·mū haughty. עֵינַ֑י <WH5869> ‘ê·nay my eyes וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> wə·lō- I do not הִלַּ֓כְתִּי׀ <WH1980> hil·laḵ·tî aspire בִּגְדֹל֖וֹת <WH1419> biḡ·ḏō·lō·wṯ to great things וּבְנִפְלָא֣וֹת <WH6381> ū·ḇə·nip̄·lā·’ō·wṯ or matters too lofty מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> mim·men·nî for me.

אִם־ <WH518> ’im- Surely לֹ֤א <WH3808> lō ... שִׁוִּ֨יתִי׀ <WH7737> šiw·wî·ṯî I have stilled וְדוֹמַ֗מְתִּי <WH1826> wə·ḏō·w·mam·tî and quieted נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <WH5315> nap̄·šî my soul; כְּ֭גָמֻל <WH1580> kə·ḡā·mul like a weaned child עֲלֵ֣י <WH5921> ‘ă·lê ... אִמּ֑וֹ <WH517> ’im·mōw with his mother, כַּגָּמֻ֖ל <WH1580> kag·gā·mul like a weaned child עָלַ֣י <WH5921> ‘ā·lay within me. נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> nap̄·šî is my soul

יַחֵ֣ל <WH3176> ya·ḥêl put your hope יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl O Israel, אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- in יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD, מֵֽ֝עַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> mê·‘at·tāh both now וְעַד־ <WH5704> wə·‘aḏ- and forevermore עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> ‘ō·w·lām ....
